title: Upstream GCP Service Auth
description: Creates an ID Token from Google's OAuth service and attaches it to the outgoing request. Useful when calling GCP services that are secured with GCP IAM.

export.description: The name of the exported type

audience.description: The audience for the service to be called. This is typically the URL of your service endpoint like 'https://my-service-a2ev-uc.a.run.app'

serviceAccountJson.description: The Google Service Account key in JSON format. Note you can load this from environment variables using the `$env(ENV_VAR)` syntax.

tokenRetries.description: The number of times to retry fetching the token in the event of a failure.

expirationOffsetSeconds.description: The number of seconds less than the token expiration to cache the token.

useMemoryCacheOnly.description: This is an advanced option that should only be used if you do not want to persist information in ZoneCache.
